title: Charming Plymouth Meeting House for RENT
description: Welcome to Plymouth Meeting and this wonderful single story ranch home!  If you desire single floor living, this is an ideal candidate.  Over the years the current owner has made some major improvements to this home.  A large master suite addition was added to the home that includes a on suite full bathroom, two large closets including on massive walk in closet.  With the master addition this home offers two very good sized bedrooms, Two full baths, and a den that would be ideal as a dressing room, office, or small TV room as its currently used.  The windows have been replaced, much of the flooring is hardwood, updated roof and heating system as well as Central air.   Mix all of this with the colonial school system and the convenience and ease of access to both shopping and major commuting points this makes for a great place to call home!  The property also have a detached garage, storage shed, fenced back yard, glass sun room/Florida room, and plenty of Off street parking.

title: Available Immediately - 3 Beds  2.5 Baths  2,000 sqft
description: Available Immediately - Unique Opportunity to rent a Brand New (never lived-in) Single Family Home in Kennett Square Borough and within walking distance of restaurants & many other attractions. The first level of this beautiful, energy efficient detached home includes an Open Floor Plan with a bright, spacious Great Room that flows into an elegant Dining Area. The modern Kitchen offers Century white decorative cabinets with crown molding accompanied by a center island, Quartz countertops, Whirlpool stainless steel appliance package and a generous pantry for storage. A half bath and Two Car Attached Garage complete the main floor. The second level features an Owners En-Suite including a tray ceiling, walk in closet, and full bath with a double bowl vanity, 6 X 6 ceramic tile floor, shower with tiled walls, and private commode. Two additional, spacious Bedrooms are separated by a Jack-n-Jill full bath, ideal for family and/or guests. A Study, perfect for working/learning-from-home, completes the second level. The full unfinished basement has 9 foot ceilings and an escape-well window, providing loads of natural daylight. Numerous upgrades, rear yard for family fun, and much more.

title: Here is your opportunity to live in spacious 1 bedroom!
description:
Here is your opportunity to live in one of the most sought after neighborhoods of Philadelphia. This newly renovated spacious 1 bedroom is located in Old City surrounded by art galleries, shops, cafes, and amazing restaurants. The WireWorks building stands timeless with its red brick exterior. The main entrance has a pristine kept garden terrace and covered walkway. Bright natural light illuminates the spacious living area and calls attention to the ultimate open floor plan that allows for plenty of options depending on your lifestyle. Design one large living area or designate space for a dining area - the opportunities are endless. The newly renovated kitchen overlooks the living space and features everything you need to prepare the perfect meal, including ample cabinet space, quartz countertops, and modern stainless steel amenities. The character of the residence continues into the bedroom, where elevated ceilings, tons of space, and beautiful natural light make this the ultimate retreat. The photos show a corner screen, which once removed opens up the bedroom space. The bathroom is newly renovated, clean and contemporary, and includes a spacious vanity sink and shower. Just outside the bathroom is the washer and dryer. The Condo has large windows allowing sunlight to flood the space highlighting the character of the exposed brick walls. The Wireworks provides secured entry off a private courtyard. Residents have a private driveway, perfect for loading and unloading. There is a parking garage across the street for a monthly fee or permit parking from the city for street parking at very low annual cost (consult PPA for details). Bike storage is available in the courtyard level as well as storage in the ceiling within the condo. Conveniently located just steps from Sassafras Market, Cafe Ole, Race Street Cafe and loads of unique restaurants, boutiques and art galleries. Stroll down to the exciting new attractions along the waterfront which include: Race Street Pier, Cherry Street Pier, Harbor Park, Blue Cross River Rink. Book your tour now as this chance to own in one of Philadelphia's most premier buildings will not be around for long! Tenant pays electric, gas, cable, internet, and phone. $70 per person application fee. One time $400 move in/move out fee. Must schedule move in with HOA during weekday. Move in is Monday-Friday 8:00-noon. Minimum 1 year lease. No smoking. No pets. Application includes credit check, verification of income, verification of employment, criminal and background check, previous housing check.
301 Race St #503

title: Big Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, Washer and Dryer
description:
The home at 1602 is a 1,180 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 16th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home as early as September 17, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, L'Occitane, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scothc & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, Aleksandar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Marathon on the Square, The Continental Mid-town, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Joe's Pizza, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros., and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in ice cream from Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the farmer's market at Rittenhouse Square every Tuesday and Saturday form 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM! There is so much to do in this area!

title: Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)!
description:
Welcome home to Alder Court (aka 1035 Lombard Street #4)! A serene and very private & secured urban oasis surrounded by picturesque landscaping nestled in the heart of coveted Washington Square West. The Parking is optional, and if not needed, the rent would be lowered accordingly. This stunning, light filled 3- story, 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home, with 2 outdoor spaces and a fabulous finished lower level is a must-see! Approaching this very special home, you will first experience the large front patio paved in sleek tile. Then upon entering, open the door to the sun drenched open floor plan featuring the gorgeous kitchen with impressive 42 inch maple cabinetry, stainless appliances & farm house sink, elegant granite counter tops, glass subway tile backsplash, built-in wine rack, a huge breakfast bar with pendant lighting and a picturesque view of the courtyard all open to the living/dining room with floor to ceiling windows and recessed lighting. The second floor offers 2 very spacious bedrooms flooded with natural light, ceiling fans and excellent closet space with decorative closet doors. The renovated hallway bathroom features 2 stylish vessel sink vanities and a tumbled tiled shower. The laundry area completes this floor. Heading to the third floor to the fabulous master bedroom suite with a vaulted ceiling, rolling barn closet doors, recessed lighting, a luxurious master bathroom with 2 modern extra large vanities and an oversized glass tile shower opens to the wonderful private roof top deck! The lower level showcases a spectacular family room with attractive custom built-ins, a powder room and 2 large storage closets. Gleaming hardwood floors throughout every room. There is a large storage shed off the patio. The Parking Spot is located just a half a block away at the corner of Quince & Lombard in a secured lot for separate purchase or rent. First, last & one month's security deposit due at lease signing. $50 application fee per applicant.
1035 Lombard St #4

description:
This remarkable 2 bedroom, 2 bath Condo with 1 car parking is located at Pier 3 on the Delaware River Waterfront. Situated between Race St. Pier & Penn's Landing, the unit boasts amazing views of the Ben Franklin Bridge with a modern open floor plan and chef's kitchen. Upon entering you are greeted by a private foyer with ample storage space, ascend one flight of stairs to an open breezy hallway where the water awaits. The bright living room features 14 ft high ceilings, ceiling fan, exposed ductwork and a wood burning fireplace. The open kitchen offers plenty of storage, replete with granite countertops, a stainless steel sink with gooseneck faucet, tile backsplash and 42 inch cabinets with undermount lighting. A new dishwasher is being installed. The primary bedroom includes exposed beams, a private newly renovated full bath, 2 closets and balcony that over looks the recently renovated atrium. The second bedroom is spacious and sunny. Full sized laundry is located in the hall guest bath. The pet-friendly building’s amenities include; 24 hour concierge, gated private garage parking, a heated indoor pool, fitness center and a community terrace on the river with extraordinary views. title: Renovated Studio Apartment Home, Wood Floors, City View, Package Room
description:
The studio apartment home at 1006 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 10th floor features large windows that face north and have a city view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 7, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, The Continental Mid-town, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Alchemy, and Elixr. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen and Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery or pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Laundry room featuring a single washer and a single dryer on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor

title: Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood
description:
Welcome to a Penthouse unit in the bustling Old City neighborhood. This bright one bed/one bath rental is perfectly located in the middle of Philadelphia's historic section (5 minute walk to the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall). Walking distance from a huge number of restaurants, bars, and historic landmarks, you could make the most of this pedestrian's paradise. The property comes with private, in-unit laundry and a great view of center city. While you can walk, or take public transportation, to anywhere you would want to go, the building does have parking available (for an additional $150/month). In addition to the skyline view, the modern kitchen comes with a dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, Refrigerator and an oven/range. The unit is pet friendly for one dog or cat, under 50 lbs. There is a $500 pet deposit, which will be held with the security deposit. Please get in touch to see this wonderfully sunny piece of Philadelphia before it's snatched up.

description:
Artisan Square's park-like setting gives residents a tranquil atmosphere, while its refreshing swimming pool, onsite management office, and 24-hour emergency maintenance services provide the carefree apartment living experience you deserve. Visit us today for a tour!
This one bedroom one bathroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen with Quartz countertops. This unit also features a coat closet, linen closet, and a washer/dryer!
The room is fully furnished, with plenty of mahogany book cases, carpeted for comfort closet for storage of your travel cases and a picture window view of the river Hudson and see the shipping Tugs, Tankers and flotsam of river traffic to delight the eye and, and rest the mind (see pic). The neighborhood is safe and with all the restaurants you could ever wish for s Japanese, Chinese, Tai, Mexican, and gyms., in short you have everything at a 2 min from your front door.
About me I am a straight white AngloAm. over 40, and am retired from the game. I have a major shows of my work in November and December, that takes all my thoughts, so you are left with a maximum privacy I was jogger, a non smoke and non drinker, easy going. I have mostly rented to several Columbia students and a variety of professionals from a district attorney, to a bridge builder, and professors, and doctors, 9 3 a variety. All enjoyed staying here and needed, a place that is secure, very quite, it is essence a place for study sorry no frilly couches. (see pic) so there is no excuses not to achieve those goals especially with the price I am asking ! As for me, I have so much work to do I don’t feel the need to socialize too much so you have most of the apartment to use.
With 2 blocks to the subway 'A' train and only 15 min to 59 street on the 'A' train express. Easy connect to the 'D' or the 'B' and the number '1' also very close.
This is a two bedroom apartment, trying to get two roommates together to rent this place. Both rooms are about the same size, $1650 per room. Entire apartment is $3300
Room in spacious two bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Windows in every room = tons of natural light. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere!
If you’re interested, please hit me up with a brief description about yourself so that I can potentially connect you with other people looking for rooms.

title: Cat Friendly, Large Apartment with Balcony New Kitchen
description:
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.

title: Restored Townhouse Near Penn. Pet Friendly
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.

title: Come fall in love with this brand new 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt!
description:
3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 17, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Philadelphia Runner, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Savor a coffee and croissant at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum or Barnes Foundation. Check out the Mutter Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Spa Nail Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Package lockers by Luxor One
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
* * *Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.* * *
Welcome home!
